channel.title: Someone PLEASE Help!
channel.description:
Every time I try to log onto moparscape I get this error:
"Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own."
I have done that and even after I have tried to make my own server, it still won't let me log in. Someone please help me. :(
Thanks,
Iron.

item.title: Someone PLEASE Help!
item.dc:creator: @Iron_Curtion Iron_Curtion
item.description:
@Iron_Curtion wrote:

I have tried changing the server IP. I’ve went to the server IP list and I’ve tried plenty of them. It will not let me in no matter what. What should I change the port to?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 03, 2007, 08:18:50 AM[/size][hr]Still not working…

Read full topic

item.title: Someone PLEASE Help!
item.dc:creator: @Kulkka Kulkka
item.description:
@Kulkka wrote:

Change server IP or port.

Read full topic
